From Coq Require Import ssreflect ssrbool.
From MetaCoq.Template Require Import config utils Ast AstUtils Environment.

Inversion lemmas for the well-formedness judgement

Fixpoint wf_Inv (t : term) :=
  match t with
  | tRel _ | tVar _ | tSort _ | tInt _ | tFloat _ => True
  | tEvar n l => Forall wf l
  | tCast t k t' => wf t /\ wf t'
  | tProd na t b => wf t /\ wf b
  | tLambda na t b => wf t /\ wf b
  | tLetIn na t b b' => wf t /\ wf b /\ wf b'
  | tApp t u => isApp t = false /\ u <> nil /\ wf t /\ Forall wf u
  | tConst _ _ | tInd _ _ | tConstruct _ _ _ => True
  | tCase ci p c brs => Forall wf (pparams p) /\ wf (preturn p) /\ wf c /\ Forall (wf ‚àò bbody) brs
  | tProj p t => wf t
  | tFix mfix k => Forall (fun def => wf def.(dtype) /\ wf def.(dbody)) mfix
  | tCoFix mfix k => Forall (fun def => wf def.(dtype) /\ wf def.(dbody)) mfix
  end.


t:term
w:wf t
wf_Inv t


t:term
w:wf t
wf_Inv t

  induction w; simpl; auto.
Defined.


f:term
l:list term
~~ isApp f -> decompose_app (mkApps f l) = (f, l)


f:term
l:list term
~~ isApp f -> decompose_app (mkApps f l) = (f, l)

  
f:term
l:list term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
decompose_app (mkApps f l) = (f, l)
 
f:term
l:list term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
match mkApps f l with
| tApp f0 l0 => (f0, l0)
| _ => (mkApps f l, [])
end = (f, l)

  
f:term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
match mkApps f [] with
| tApp f0 l => (f0, l)
| _ => (mkApps f [], [])
end = (f, [])
f, t:term
l:list term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
match mkApps f (t :: l) with
| tApp f0 l0 => (f0, l0)
| _ => (mkApps f (t :: l), [])
end = (f, t :: l)
 
f:term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
match f with
| tApp f0 l => (f0, l)
| _ => (f, [])
end = (f, [])
f, t:term
l:list term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
match mkApps f (t :: l) with
| tApp f0 l0 => (f0, l0)
| _ => (mkApps f (t :: l), [])
end = (f, t :: l)
 
f, t:term
l:list term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
match mkApps f (t :: l) with
| tApp f0 l0 => (f0, l0)
| _ => (mkApps f (t :: l), [])
end = (f, t :: l)

  
f, t:term
l:list term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
t0:term
Heq:t0 = mkApps f (t :: l)
match t0 with
| tApp f0 l0 => (f0, l0)
| _ => (t0, [])
end = (f, t :: l)
 
f, t:term
l:list term
Hf:is_true (~~ isApp f)
t0:term
Heq:t0 =
match f with
| tApp f0 args => tApp f0 (args ++ t :: l)
| _ => tApp f (t :: l)
end
match t0 with
| tApp f0 l0 => (f0, l0)
| _ => (t0, [])
end = (f, t :: l)

  
f:term
args:list term
t:term
l:list term
Hf:is_true false
(f, args ++ t :: l) = (tApp f args, t :: l)
 discriminate.
Qed.


t:term
~~ isApp t -> decompose_app t = (t, [])


t:term
~~ isApp t -> decompose_app t = (t, [])
 destruct t; simpl; congruence. Qed.


t, t':term
l, l':list term
mkApps t l = mkApps t' l' ->
~~ isApp t -> ~~ isApp t' -> t = t' /\ l = l'


t, t':term
l, l':list term
mkApps t l = mkApps t' l' ->
~~ isApp t -> ~~ isApp t' -> t = t' /\ l = l'

  
t, t':term
l, l':list term
Happ:mkApps t l = mkApps t' l'
Ht:is_true (~~ isApp t)
Ht':is_true (~~ isApp t')
t = t' /\ l = l'
 
t, t':term
l, l':list term
Happ:decompose_app (mkApps t l) =
decompose_app (mkApps t' l')
Ht:is_true (~~ isApp t)
Ht':is_true (~~ isApp t')
t = t' /\ l = l'

  
t, t':term
l, l':list term
Ht:is_true (~~ isApp t)
Ht':is_true (~~ isApp t')
Happ:(t, l) = (t', l')
t = t' /\ l = l'
 intuition congruence.
Qed.

Inductive mkApps_spec : term -> list term -> term -> list term -> term -> Type :=
| mkApps_intro f l n :
    ~~ isApp f ->
    mkApps_spec f l (mkApps f (firstn n l)) (skipn n l) (mkApps f l).

Definition is_empty {A} (l : list A) :=
  if l is nil then true else false.


A:Type
l, l':list A
is_empty (l ++ l') = is_empty l && is_empty l'


A:Type
l, l':list A
is_empty (l ++ l') = is_empty l && is_empty l'

  induction l; simpl; auto.
Qed.

(* Fixpoint wf_term (t : term) : bool :=
  match t with
  | tRel _ | tVar _ | tInt _ | tFloat _ => true
  | tEvar n l => forallb wf_term l
  | tSort u => true
  | tCast t k t' => wf_term t && wf_term t'
  | tProd na t b => wf_term t && wf_term b
  | tLambda na t b => wf_term t && wf_term b
  | tLetIn na t b b' => wf_term t && wf_term b && wf_term b'
  | tApp t u => ~~ isApp t && ~~ is_empty u && wf_term t && forallb wf_term u
  | tConst _ _ | tInd _ _ | tConstruct _ _ _ => true
  | tCase ci p c brs => forallb wf_term (pparams p) && wf_term (preturn p)
                        && wf_term c && forallb (wf_term ‚àò snd) brs
  | tProj p t => wf_term t
  | tFix mfix k =>
    forallb (fun def => wf_term def.(dtype) && wf_term def.(dbody) && isLambda def.(dbody)) mfix
  | tCoFix mfix k =>
    forallb (fun def => wf_term def.(dtype) && wf_term def.(dbody)) mfix
  end. *)


f:term
args:list term
~~ isApp f ->
~~ is_empty args -> tApp f args = mkApps f args


f:term
args:list term
~~ isApp f ->
~~ is_empty args -> tApp f args = mkApps f args

  
f:term
args:list term
H:is_true (~~ isApp f)
H0:is_true (~~ is_empty args)
tApp f args = mkApps f args

  destruct args, f; try discriminate; auto.
Qed.
(* 
Lemma decompose_app_inv' f l hd args : wf_term f ->
                                       decompose_app (mkApps f l) = (hd, args) ->
                                       ‚àë n, ~~ isApp hd /\ l = skipn n args /\ f = mkApps hd (firstn n args).
Proof.
  destruct (isApp f) eqn:Heq.
  revert l args hd.
  induction f; try discriminate. intros.
  simpl in H.
  move/andP: H => [/andP [/andP [isAppf Hargs] wff] wfargs].
  rewrite mkApps_tApp in H0 => //. rewrite mkApps_nested in H0.
  rewrite decompose_app_mkApps in H0; auto. inversion H0. subst.
  exists #|args|; split; auto. rewrite skipn_all_app.
  rewrite firstn_app. rewrite firstn_all2. lia.
  rewrite Nat.sub_diag firstn_O app_nil_r. split; auto.
  now rewrite mkApps_tApp.

  intros wff fl.
  rewrite decompose_app_mkApps in fl; auto. now apply negbT.
  inversion fl. subst; exists 0.
  split; auto. now eapply negbT.
Qed. *)

(* Lemma mkApps_elim t l : wf_term t ->
                        let app' := decompose_app (mkApps t l) in
                        mkApps_spec app'.1 app'.2 t l (mkApps t l).
Proof.
  destruct app' as [hd args] eqn:Heq.
  subst app'.
  have H' := decompose_app_inv' _ _ _ _ H Heq.
  destruct H'. simpl. destruct a as [isapp [Hl' Hl]].
  subst t.
  have H' := mkApps_intro hd args x. rewrite Hl'.
  rewrite mkApps_nested. now rewrite firstn_skipn.
Qed. *)


t:term
l:list term
~~ isApp (mkApps t l) -> ~~ isApp t /\ l = []


t:term
l:list term
~~ isApp (mkApps t l) -> ~~ isApp t /\ l = []

  
t, a:term
l:list term
IHl:forall t0 : term, ~~ isApp (mkApps t0 l) -> ~~ isApp t0 /\ l = []
~~
isApp
  match t with
  | tApp f args => tApp f (args ++ a :: l)
  | _ => tApp t (a :: l)
  end -> ~~ isApp t /\ a :: l = []

  
t, a:term
l:list term
IHl:forall t0 : term, ~~ isApp (mkApps t0 l) -> ~~ isApp t0 /\ l = []
H:is_true
  (~~
   isApp
     match t with
     | tApp f args => tApp f (args ++ a :: l)
     | _ => tApp t (a :: l)
     end)
~~ isApp t /\ a :: l = []

  (~~
   isApp
     match t with
     | tApp f args => tApp f (args ++ a :: l)
     | _ => tApp t (a :: l)
     end)
Heq:isApp t = true
~~ true /\ a :: l = []
t, a:term
l:list term
IHl:forall t0 : term, ~~ isApp (mkApps t0 l) -> ~~ isApp t0 /\ l = []
H:is_true
  (~~
   isApp
     match t with
     | tApp f args => tApp f (args ++ a :: l)
     | _ => tApp t (a :: l)
     end)
Heq:isApp t = false
~~ false /\ a :: l = []
 
t, a:term
l:list term
IHl:forall t0 : term, ~~ isApp (mkApps t0 l) -> ~~ isApp t0 /\ l = []
H:is_true
  (~~
   isApp
     match t with
     | tApp f args => tApp f (args ++ a :: l)
     | _ => tApp t (a :: l)
     end)
Heq:isApp t = false
~~ false /\ a :: l = []

  destruct t; try discriminate.
Qed.


t, t':term
l:list term
mkApps t l = t' -> ~~ isApp t' -> t = t' /\ l = []


t, t':term
l:list term
mkApps t l = t' -> ~~ isApp t' -> t = t' /\ l = []

  
t:term
l:list term
~~ isApp (mkApps t l) -> t = mkApps t l /\ l = []
 
t:term
l:list term
H:is_true (~~ isApp (mkApps t l))
t = mkApps t l /\ l = []
 
t:term
l:list term
H:~~ isApp t /\ l = []
t = mkApps t l /\ l = []
 
t:term
l:list term
H0:is_true (~~ isApp t)
H1:l = []
t = mkApps t l

  now subst.
Qed.

Ltac solve_discr' :=
  match goal with
    H : mkApps _ _ = mkApps ?f ?l |- _ =>
    eapply mkApps_eq_inj in H as [? ?]; [|easy|easy]; subst; try intuition congruence
  | H : ?t = mkApps ?f ?l |- _ =>
    change t with (mkApps t []) in H ;
    eapply mkApps_eq_inj in H as [? ?]; [|easy|easy]; subst; try intuition congruence
  | H : mkApps ?f ?l = ?t |- _ =>
    change t with (mkApps t []) in H ;
    eapply mkApps_eq_inj in H as [? ?]; [|easy|easy]; subst; try intuition congruence
  end.
